recipesJson.name: Aura: Forest
recipesJson.author: CheebaSteeba
recipesJson.description:
**Twilight has fallen -- Enter the forest.**  

A refreshing, lightly floral mix of berries and spices.

reviews.text: Bright strawberry right up front, the forest mix brings some extra depth to that potent candy strawberry up front.  Between the hops, cactus, and absinthe, this ends up tasting like strawberry-basil.  It's a sweeter recipe, but it manages to avoid pushing that sweetness too far into that herbal backend and ruining the balance.  All in all, really refreshing, interesting, and well-balanced.
